name: vscode-dotnet-adapter
description: Run your dotnet core cs tests in the Sidebar of Visual Studio Code

scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build

dotnetCoreExplorer.skippattern.description:
Pattern to skip assemblies

Files already excluded by the files.exclude or search.exclude VSCode settings will also be skipped by the test adapter (ensure you can see dll files in the file explorer)

dotnetCoreExplorer.searchpatterns.description:
A string, array or object of search patterns which match your test files (relative to the workspace folder).

Arrays can be used to specify multiple differing patterns. Objects can be used to provide test grouping, where the key is the group name and the value is either a glob pattern string or an array of glob pattern strings.

dotnetCoreExplorer.runEnvVars.description: environment variables required by your tests or project

dotnetCoreExplorer.attachCpp.description: Attach C++ debugging during test debugging

dotnetCoreExplorer.codeLens.description: enable CodeLens symbol integration with the C# Omnisharp VSCode extension

dotnetCoreExplorer.maxCpuCount.description: Enable parallel test execution. If value is zero then parallel process count is not limited

dotnetCoreExplorer.logpanel.description: write diagnotic logs to an output panel
